mapper.sql:
id, name, icon, title, parent_id, path, redirect, component,
showLink, rank, create_time, update_time, is_delete
mapper.insert:
insert into my_admin.sys_routers(name, icon, title, parent_id, path, redirect, component, showLink, rank, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.redirect}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.showlink}, #{entity.rank}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})

insert into my_admin.sys_routers(name, icon, title, parent_id, path, redirect, component, showLink, rank, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values
(#{entity.name}, #{entity.icon}, #{entity.title}, #{entity.parentId}, #{entity.path}, #{entity.redirect}, #{entity.component}, #{entity.showlink}, #{entity.rank}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDelete})
on duplicate key update name = values(name) , icon = values(icon) , title = values(title) , parent_id = values(parent_id) , path = values(path) , redirect = values(redirect) , component = values(component) , showLink = values(showLink) , rank = values(rank) , create_time = values(create_time) , update_time = values(update_time) , is_delete = values(is_delete)
